trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is looking longingly at the sky.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the green astamudgara to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_001<tab>Got a moment to spare? I've been wantin' some flowers to lay down as an offerin' to Sanduruva...
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_002<tab>Only a certain kind'll do, though─dark green astamudgara. They only grow at Night's Watch, to the east of Yedlihmad.

TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_003<tab>They'll fall to bits if you don't pick 'em right, but I reckon you've got a delicate touch. More so than any of <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> clumsy oafs, that's for certain...

TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_004<tab>Anyhow, a pair of our Riders'll be standin' by in case you need assistance gettin' up or down. Flower pickin' ain't their forte, but I've never seen such hippo-cart derrin'-do...
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_011<tab>Yeah, these are the ones! An' in great condition, too.
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_012<tab>Of all eight colors of astamudgara, they say Sanduruva likes this dark green the best.
TEXT_BANARK105_04555_MARU_000_013<tab>When you're prayin' for good business, it's these flowers or nothin'. We've gotta make sure we're pullin' out all the stops, after all...
